item.content:encoded:
The main purposes of this site are:

  • to allow me to create and share content easily.
  • to be quick and easy to use for a reader.

After trying numerous other website-creation tools, I eventually settled on using the Hugo static site generator along with the PaperModX theme which I forked to apply the Nord color scheme.

All the content pages are written in the Markdown format, which then allows me to use Obsidian as my text editor of choice, which works fantastic! I only needed to pull some easy gitignore magic to exclude the Obsidian-related files from the content of the website.

If you want to know more about my previous attempts at creating this site and why I discarded them, have a look here!

item.content:encoded:
TL;DR

Hello there, my name is Harvey Lim (21M, as of August 2023).

I am a Malaysian-born Chinese person who has gone through education in Finland. However, I only speak native-level English along with conversational-level Chinese.

Currently, I am a 3rd-year bachelors student at Aalto University, majoring in Digital Systems and Design and minoring in Computer Science.

More

If I were to describe myself, I’d be

Extra Bits

There are actually several variations of my name:

  • Harvey Lim Shuang Zhe
    • This is my original full name.
  • Harvey Shuang Zhe Lim
    • In western countries, I have to put my surname (Lim) at the end of my name, causing it to be reorganized a bit.
  • 林双喆 (lín shuāng zhé)
    • My Chinese name, which I use rarely.
  • 双喆 (shuāng zhé)
    • The nickname version of my Chinese name.

In a nutshell, calling me “Harvey” will do just fine :)
